sections.general:
CONSULTANT
Professional Summary
Highly organized Microbiologist successful at managing people and time, with expertise in Molecular Genetic Research, Quality Control System
Operations, Cross Functional Leadership, Consulting, Training and Development and Validation of new products and facilities.
